name: Mitigation Playbook for Web Application Command Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker exploited a web application vulnerability to execute custom scripts on the server. Immediate measures are taken to kill the malicious processes, perform a system scan, and block any outbound connections to suspicious IPs.

action--d4c641d1-96ed-4676-a4c0-018b60e1.name: Kill malicious process
action--d4c641d1-96ed-4676-a4c0-018b60e1.description: Terminate any processes executing the malicious script.

parallel--be5b81c0-4e4c-4042-8c98-7c94c0.name: Execute Mitigations in Parallel
parallel--be5b81c0-4e4c-4042-8c98-7c94c0.description: Run system scan and block IPs concurrently.

action--1bfa920e-f638-4e82-b04f-3c53d783.name: Perform a full system scan
action--1bfa920e-f638-4e82-b04f-3c53d783.description: Conduct a full system scan and remove any infected files.

action--9ec7e0c2-800b-4eaa-b1a5-9927f1f8.name: Block outgoing connections to suspicious IPs
action--9ec7e0c2-800b-4eaa-b1a5-9927f1f8.description: Block any outbound connections to identified malicious IPs.
